Name.label: Growth and developmental delay-hypotonia-vision impairment-lactic acidosis syndrome
Mitochondrial oxidative phosphorylation disorder with no known mechanism

TextSection.Contents: Growth and developmental delay-hypotonia-vision impairment-lactic acidosis syndrome is a rare, genetic, mitochondrial oxidative phosphorylation disorder characterized by intrauterine growth retardation, microcephaly, hypotonia, vision impairment, speech and language delay and lactic acidosis with reduced respiratory chain activity (typically complex I). Additonal features may include macrocytic anemia, tremor, muscular atrophy, dysmetria and mild intellectual disability.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))
